title: The Silencing Darkness
opening: Roy ventured deep inside the Temple of Seals. Apparently, there was something else hidden there other than the Binding Blade.
However, Pereth, one of Murdock’s best lieutenants, was already inside the temple and waiting to ambush Roy.

intro.speaker: Pereth
intro.line: So the battle above the ground was lost...

intro.speaker: Soldier
intro.line: Yes.

intro.speaker: Pereth
intro.line: I would have liked to be at Lord Murdock’s side when he fell.

intro.speaker: Soldier
intro.line: ...We share your feelings.

intro.speaker: Pereth
intro.line: However, we have an important mission from Lord Murdock. We must defend this Divine Weapon. The Silencing Darkness, Apocalypse, must not fall into the enemy’s hands!

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: There’s a Divine Weapon under here?

intro.speaker: Melady
intro.line: Yes, I believe so. I have only heard rumors within the army, but apparently there is a spell book here that was placed to protect the Temple of Seals from intruders.

intro.speaker: Elffin
intro.line: This place is guarded by Bern’s troops as well. It is highly probable that the spell book that she speaks of is a Divine Weapon.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Yes. We’re going up against Zephiel soon. ...I want to have as many weapons as possible ready before we enter the castle. We have to get that book.

intro.speaker: Melady
intro.line: I have also heard rumors that there are traps all over the underground level.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Traps?

intro.speaker: Melady
intro.line: Yes. Apparently, they are crafted so well that we have no chance of finding them before they go off. Perhaps Thieves would be better at spotting the traps... Anyway, please be careful.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: All right. Let’s be wary.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Princess Guinevere, is this where the Divine Weapon is?

intro.speaker: Guinevere
intro.line: Probably... I have only heard rumors that there is a spell book here that was placed to protect the Temple of Seals from intruders.

intro.speaker: Elffin
intro.line: This place is guarded by Bern’s troops as well. It is highly probable that the spell book that she speaks of is a Divine Weapon.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Yes. We’re going up against Zephiel soon. ...I want to have as many weapons as possible ready before we enter the castle. We have to get that book.

intro.speaker: Guinevere
intro.line: I also understand that there are numerous traps placed in the underground level.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Traps?

intro.speaker: Guinevere
intro.line: Yes. They are designed so well that it would be impossible for us to find them. Perhaps Thieves would be better at finding them... Please be careful.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Yes, Princess. We will be careful.

boss.speaker: Pereth
boss.line: Darkness from an age long forgotten… I will show you its power.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Elffin, do you know what this spell book is?

end.speaker: Elffin
end.line: ...It is probably the Apocalypse spell book.

end.speaker: Elffin
end.line: Yes, it is also known as the Silencing Darkness. Brammimond... the most mysterious of the Eight Heroes...used it.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Brammimond... I only know his name.

end.speaker: Elffin
end.line: We don’t even know if Brammimond was male or female, old or young. None of the ancient scrolls say anything specific about Brammimond.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: I was wondering why there’s always some kind of trap where a Divine Weapon lies.

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: ...Perhaps it is to warn people that their power is too great to be dealt with lightly.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: But still... The traps are so carefully set. There must be other reasons.

end.speaker: Elffin
end.line: ...I wondered about the same thing. Perhaps I shall look into it.
